member.name: T:CleanArchitectureBase.WebAPI.ApiVersions
member.summary: NOTICE* To create a new Version for example v3 you need to do 4 steps - Add public const string V3 = "3"; in this class. - Change the config "documentName" in file nswag.json to v3 ("documentName": "v2") - Add this command to NSwag build target in WebAPI.csproj Exec Command="$(NSwagExe_Net50) run /v3/swagger.json /variables:Configuration=$(Configuration)" /> - In Angular Client app open app.module.ts and change API_BASE_URL to 'api/v3'
